question: Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan has been elected as the new President of which country?
explanation: The UAE Supreme Council has re-elected His Highness Shaikh Khalifa Bin Zayed Al Nahyan as President of the UAE for a fourth five-year term. He was first elected President on 3rd November 2004, following the death of his father Shaikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nahyan. The President of UAE is the head of state of the country.
